title: More bloody meetings: the human side of meetings (NP)
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Employees - Training of

description: The sequel to "Meetings, Bloody Meetings". "More Bloody Meetings" aims to develop the interpersonal skills of chairpersons. Demonstrates techniques to improve people handling skills at meetings in order to improve the decision making process. Features John Cleese and Graeme Garden. FOR USE ONLY IN A DOMESTIC SITUATION OR FOR EDUCATIONAL PURPOSES ONLY.
